name: UpdatePromoCode
description:
Update details of a specific promo code.

Use this tool to update the details of a specific promo code in an eCommerce store using Mailchimp. It should be called when you need to modify existing promotional codes, such as changing the discount or expiration date.

parameters.name: store_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the eCommerce store in Mailchimp.

parameters.name: promo_rule_identifier
parameters.description: The identifier for the promo rule in a store. Used to specify which promotional rule to update.

value_schema.description: The id for the promo rule of a store.

parameters.name: promo_code_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the promo code of a store.

value_schema.description: The id for the promo code of a store.

parameters.name: discount_code
parameters.description: The discount code for the promo. Must be UTF-8 and up to 50 characters.

value_schema.description: The discount code. Restricted to UTF-8 characters with max length 50.

parameters.name: promotion_redemption_url
parameters.description: The URL for the promotion campaign. Must be UTF-8, max 2000 characters.

value_schema.description: The url that should be used in the promotion campaign restricted to UTF-8 characters with max length 2000.

parameters.name: promo_code_usage_count
parameters.description: Specifies how many times the promo code has been used. Accepts an integer value.

value_schema.description: Number of times promo code has been used.

parameters.name: promotion_created_at
parameters.description: The promotion creation date and time in ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: The date and time the promotion was created in ISO 8601 format.

parameters.name: promotion_update_timestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp when the promotion was updated, in ISO 8601 format. This indicates the last update time of the promo code details.

value_schema.description: The date and time the promotion was updated in ISO 8601 format.

parameters.name: is_promo_code_enabled
parameters.description: Set to true to enable the promo code, or false to disable it.

value_schema.description: Whether the promo code is currently enabled.
